root.str: With a new rhythm of inflow and outflow of plantlife and research materials from The Shattered Warpgate, factions become increasingly paranoid of any progress made by the opposing empires. You are tasked to subvert the developments of your rivals by corrupting the information held within Biolabs beyond Esamir.
Vehicle - Valkyrie - Weapon 06 - 60mm - Ammo - Ammo Capacity 6
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 6.25%
Adds fiery cosmetic propulsion effects to this vehicle. TR use only.

The Proximity Radar certification for the Prowler has been removed from the Utility slot and certification points have been refunded. Proximity Radar is now available as a Defense slot certification and can be repurchased there.
Integrated power cells increase Jump Jet maximum fuel by 35%, and Ambusher Jump Jet's cooldown is reduced by 0.8 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 360 rounds.
Participate in a Meltdown alert on Esamir when the victor is declared. Your faction does not need to be the winner.
Reduces damage taken from frag grenades and common explosions by 50%, and infantry rockets by 20%.
Celebrate the Fifth Anniversary of PlanetSide 2 with this decal. This decal can be applied to vehicles.
Increases the lock-on disruption to 10 seconds.
Adds cyan chassis lights to the under carriage of the Sunderer. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 18 rounds.
Apply the single use Woodland camo pattern to your armor. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.

An experimental prototype based off the EM4 resulted in the Moonshot, a hyper-long range bolt-action sniper rifle. While stealth is not the Moonshot's specialty, the speed at which it can drop even the farthest targets offsets its drawbacks.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 600 rounds.
Adds 6 rounds to the default magazine size.
Awarded for mastery of the Lightning, this Auraxium-infused Lumifiber trim shows off the owner's talents in a one-man tank.
Your final objectives remain, capture or defend a facility. If you're not already at a facility, make your way to a control point of a facility, look for the "A", "B" or "C" on the mini map.
Your personal shield health is increased by 400, and 400 health is removed from your health pool.
Apply the Carbonation camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only.

The SVA-GG's overclocked discharge coil allows it to fire plasma at a higher velocity than most weapons in its class. When firing at long distances, the user will need to lead targets much less than usual. VS use only.
Use the Galaxy's Ammo Dispenser to resupply squad vehicles in regions that are adjacent to enemy territory, i.e. "Front Lines".
Increases the Idle Timer on the Magrider to 24 minutes.
Increases the vehicle's total health pool by 20%.
A signal-emitting beacon that allows squad members to drop pod into an area from low orbit.
Designed as a pistol emulating a shotgun, the unique NC7 Mag-Scatter is lethal at point-blank ranges.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.45 seconds.
Failed to remove squad from the platoon.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a NC Gold Hood Ornament.
Ammunition packs are deployable packages that can resupply ammo to nearby allies.
Single Use California Scrub Weapon Camo
This customization adds a Teal decal to the cockpit glass. All factions can use this gear.
Adds 3 rounds to the default magazine size.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 300 rounds.
Unlock defense slot Certifications to increase the Lightning's survivability on the field. Defense slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Reduces damage taken from flak, heavy machine gun, and ESF nose gun rounds by 3%.
Increases the number of restoration kits that can be carried to 3.
Shows health and shield numerics on the health bar. (Default: Off)
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Gold Lightning Hood Ornament.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 540 rounds.
There was no response from the video upload system.
Prevents lock-on weaponry from targeting nearby allied aircraft.
Win a Meltdown alert on 艾美瑞什, Esamir, Hossin, Indar, Koltyr, or Oshur
Take that point for the TR!
Mosquito Death From Above Glass Decal
Further improve the Prowler's rotation speed, reverse speed and braking power.
Apply the single use Jungle Forest camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 50 rounds.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Prowler. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 120 rounds.
Awarded for mastery of the ANT, this Auraxium-infused Lumifiber trim is a badge of honor for the owner's offroad achievements.

Operative, Nanite Systems is seeking experienced tank operators to showcase the Chimera's advanced features and lethality on the battlefield. If you are up to the task deploy a Chimera and destroy enemy armor.
Resupply squad vehicles on the front line.
The Scythe is the Vanu Sovereignty's one-man fighter. Vanu technology allows it to be a more stable aircraft when hovering and decelerating.
Speak to Sergeant Reese in the western stairway on Sanctuary.
Harvest Cortium in a contested region
The Banded Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. NC use only.
Rapidly locks on to and destroys ground-based vehicles
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 40 rounds.
Improves the efficiency of the Nanite emitters, increasing the maximum duration the shield can remain active to 12 seconds.
Allows cortium to be used to construct a Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Tower that may be manned by allied players. This object shares it's maximum in world limit with another construction item(s).
The Adrenaline Pump increases sprint speed while equipped.

When activated, the vehicle is encased in a coating that allows it to slip through enemy gate shields and avoid damage caused by collisions with other vehicles. Lasts 15 seconds. Can be activated once every 45 seconds.
Can be placed to both shield and heal nearby soldiers.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 560 rounds.
Improves the sensor darts scanning rate by a total of 0.75 seconds and extends the range to 40 meters; also extends each darts lifespan to 35 seconds and increases ammo capacity by 1.
The Heavy Assault can shield themselves from incoming damage. Try to flank them and avoid face-to-face contact.

Built from a highly-tinkered Parallax, the Parsec was the brainchild of a small group of engineers looking for long-range perfection. Though significantly louder than most sniper rifles, it drops targets before the sound wave even reaches them.

Not a Member yet?
Check out the Member tab in the Depot for more info today!
Unlock the NSX Tomoe automatic scout rifle with a full complement of attachments. All factions can use NS weapons.
Enlistment failed - the enlistment period has ended.
Collect Halloween masks.Completing this directive awards the title "the Faceless"
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34: </font> Hi there, friendo. Did you know that Valentine's Day was created as a way to get single people to feel bad about themselves?
<font color="#7FF4FF">/leader</font> - Sends a text message to the leadership channel if you have the certification to do so and are a current squad leader.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Chrome Skull Hood Ornament. All factions can use this gear.
Press [%s] to access ground vehicles terminal
Your petition to join [*guild*] has been accepted.
Your issue has been successfully submitted!

Leaking incomplete versions of the classified schematics has led to the rise of various vehicle prototypes. Destroy them and deliver the remnants so that we can determine the superior variant. This will help maximize our profits when these vehicles hit the open market.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 8.75%
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 20.
Apply the Abstract Circle camo pattern to your armor. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 160 rounds.
Apply the Honeycomb camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only.

Enables cortium regeneration over time. Restores 33 cortium a second.

Disabled when bombardment shield is active.

Cortium is used to fuel the MAD utility device and the Bombardment Shield.

Shield is created when deploying into Skylance Battery mode. Find "Deployment: Skylance Battery" passive system in the "Colossus Certs" screen for more details.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 540 rounds.
Training. Become familiar with every weapon and a selection of vehicles. Friendly-fire disabled. Experience gain disabled.
The rental period has started for [*item*].
Earn this ribbon by deploying friendly troops to the battefield where they earn kills!
You have no applicants at this time.
Unlock and improve the Heavy Assault's shield abilities. Abilities can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 2 bombs.
The Goblin SP is an anti-infantry weapon with high elevation range and rate of fire.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.27 seconds.
Failed to change the platoon leader.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 40 rockets.
Increases xp and resource gain by 50% and squad xp gain by 5% for 3 day. Squad xp bonus stacks with other squad xp boosts. Boost can only be used on this character.
Orphaned - Post Launch - Do not translate. Mosquito Inertial Dampener - Level 1

You have accumulatively been playing for 3 hours now. We suggest you getting offline and having some exercise. You are about to enter fatigue gaming time. Your in-game gains will be reduced by 50%. For your own health, please get offline as soon as possible to have some rest and exercise. Please arrange your study properly.

<font color="#00FFAA">Knightly:</font> Early attempts at reaching Oshur have been unsuccessful, but I fully expect that to change due to our recent financial alliance with Nascent Expeditions. This, however, exposes us to some additional risk.
Learn about how to resupply your vehicle.
Adds 25 rounds to the default magazine size.
Adds the Vertigo style hubcaps to your Flash. TR use only.
Enjoy with our compliments! Thank you for your commitment to Planetside 2!
Equipped with a built-in extended magazine, the Blitz GD-10's increased ammo capacity enables it to put down multiple targets between reloads. NC use only.
The heavy Quasar VM1 was one of the earliest weapons created with discovered Vanu technology. The rapid firing plasma cannon can tear apart enemy foot soldiers with ease. VS use only.
A squad has left the platoon.
Reduces the amount of time before shield begins recharging.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 95 rounds.
Kill five enemies with a Mag Shot
Capture and hold all 3 Tech Plants on 艾美瑞什
Default input device is not microphone.
A non-guided anti-aircraft flak cannon which fires projectiles that are designed to detonate near enemy aircraft and pelt it with armor melting plasma. VS use only.
Adds 20 rounds to the default magazine size.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34:</font> Taking a quuuuuuuick look around. A little for you, a little for me. Beep boop. Yadda yadda.
TR Multi Rocket Launcher - Test Weapon
Unlock various gadgets for the Sunderer's Utility slot. Utility slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Select your primary weapon, attach an optic, then Resupply.
Increases nanite gain by 50% for 7 days. Boost can only be used on this character.
Attempting to resecure <font color=\"#00C3FF\">[*region*]</font>. <font color=\"#FF0000\">Need reinforcements!</font>
Now 75 percent less likely to short circuit and explode! NC use only.
Improves the top speed and acceleration of the Lightning.
Save allied players to get this.
Once in the Sunderer, travel to the front line and resupply allied vehicles. Front lines are any areas that are adjacent to enemy regions.
Adding Credit Card To Account, Please Wait...
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.225 seconds.
Replaces buckshot with dart-like flechettes which increases minimum damage range by 20m, reduces pellet spread by 0.15, and reduces maximum damage per pellet by 10%.
Applies a decal to your armor. Available for all factions.
If you get stuck or stranded, you can use the redeploy feature to respawn somewhere else.
Allows the user to carry an additional Rocklet Rifle magazine.
Contains the platinum NS-44P Commissioner, usable by all factions, and the NC specific NC4-FB Mag-Shot.
Activate to repair 20% of the MAX's health over 12 seconds. Can be activated once every 54 seconds.
Apply the single use 艾美瑞什 Forest camo pattern to your armor. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Ignorance is the weapon of tyrants.
Increases the number of restoration kits that can be carried to 2.
Deploy the data device inside a contested enemy building.
Medic: Heal 10 medics trying to revive
Unlock passive, always-on Certifications for the Combat Medic.
Adds green chassis lights to the under carriage of the Lightning. VS use only.
The VS-Nose Cannon 04 description goes here. Blah blah blah blah [TBD]
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 6.25%
Remain nearby until download is complete
Outfit: Get 100 assists with a full squad of Outfit members
Unlock the PMG-100 with a full complement of attachments. For NSO use only.
Increases the top speed of the Magrider by 8 KPH.
Increases the ammo capacity of the weapon to 550 rounds.
Allows for the creation of a single valkyrie aircraft in the outfitwars game mode. Usable from the home base vehicle terminals by those who have outfit permission to use the item.
Wraps your Galaxy in a heavy rust trim. All factions can use this.
Follow orders! This is a team game, and squads work better when everyone does their part.
Allows use of the long range 6x S3 scope.
Single Use Esamir Snow Weapon Camo
Victory Cores contribute to the larger goal of continental conquest.
<font color="#00FFAA">Dolan:</font> It was a one-way trip for us as well. As it turns out, there is a timing component to interstellar travel.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 8 rockets.
Adds orange chassis lights to the under carriage of the Sunderer. VS use only.
Apply the Abstract Circle camo pattern to your armor. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 4 shells.
A streamlined airframe allows the Galaxy to perform more precise manuevers by improving its turn rate, roll rate, and airbrake power.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 60 missiles.
Increases fuel capacity and regeneration speed by 17%.
You can rearm ground vehicles at ammo supply towers.
Allows for the creation of a single vanguard tank in the outfitwars game mode. Usable from the home base vehicle terminals by those who have outfit permission to use the item.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 140 rounds.
Turning this on will reverse up and down for mouselook. (Default: Off)
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 11.25%
Although slower than the TR standard issue Chainblade, when wielded this knife can be activated, increasing its damage output. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 300 rounds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> Development of this facility will require large quantities of resources found terrestrially, though my technicians are still determining the remaining components that will be necessary. Until then, we can start procuring what we can of the known materials.

Generates a shield for the Sunderer when deployed that will absorb up to a certain amount of damage, but will regenerate over time. Damage done to the Sunderer or the shield will delay the shields regeneration for 8 seconds.
It's OK to redeploy to a new fight with more friendly forces if you are having trouble in your current theatre.
Restores 75 health per second to allied aircraft within 75 meters and allied ground vehicles within 50 meters, and does not affect the Galaxy itself.
VS Infiltrator Sniper Rifle Group Description

Cloak does not drain while stationary, but prevents use of primary weapons while equipped. While moving, cloak lasts up to 16 seconds. When drained, recharges to full in 10 seconds whether cloaked and stationary, or uncloaked.
Killing enemies with the same weapon will earn you ribbons and medals, both of which give you bonus certification points!
You have been ejected from the vehicle because [*reason*].
Increases afterburner recharge rate by 170%. VS use only.
Resupply allies on the front line. The front line is considered any region that has an adjacent lattice connection to an enemy region.

The NC's square M7 Scope uses a mil-dot reticle and 7x magnification.

Hold Sprint to steady aim.
Featuring 3.4x magnification and a simple crosshair, OcuLuxx's Tacti-Eye owes its success to its simplicity and ease of use.
The [*faction*] has refined 1000 raw Cortium +[*points*] VP!
Allows soldiers to carry 2 additional magazines for both their primary and sidearm weapons.
Increases the vehicle's total health pool by 8%.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 16 rounds.
Your petition to join [*guild*] has been accepted.
BECOME A MEMBER AND CLAIM YOUR REWARD
Control consoles are captured by standing near them.
Increases the time it takes for the turret to overheat during sustained fire to 12 seconds
Adds 6 rounds to the default magazine size.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 240 rounds.

Engineers can use Carbines, Submachine Guns, Shotguns, and Scout Rifles. They can also obtain specialized Anti-Materiel Rifles. In addition to these weapons, engineers can deploy various manned or automated turrets.
Depending on the weapon, increases ammo capacity per arm by an amount equal to 1 or 2 standard size magazines.
Improves the sensor darts scanning rate by a total of 0.5 seconds and extends the range to 35 meters; also extends each darts lifespan to 30 seconds.

//// The Vanu Field Commander is waiting for you at our Warpgate on the planet Auraxis. To meet with them, proceed to the Warpgate Terminal and choose an available continent to travel to. The tides of war determine which continents are accessible at any given time.
Increases the lock-on range of the weapon by 40 meters.
The Coyote Missile platform's proximity-based homing missiles excel at destroying lightly armored aircraft, but are less proficient at harming heavily armored targets. VS use only.
(TR)(Flash) Reduces Damage taken from mines by 50% and other attacks from the bottom of the vehicle by 25%
An anti-aircraft turret based on the Raycaster design. Photonically propelled tungsten projectiles can dispatch light aircraft at any range. NSO use only.
Increases the amount of XP gained by 50%.
Applies a decal to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Prowler to 13 minutes.
Adds 36 rounds to the default magazine size.

<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> Enlightened one, our enemies are constructing makeshift facilities with their ANTs. We must prevent them from establishing a foothold by destroying their bases and replacing them with our own.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 18 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 24 missiles.
Applies a decal to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Base Phalanx Turrets auto-repair over time
Apply the single use Pine Forest camo pattern to your armor. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
<font color="#00FFAA">Hadley:</font> Give it a shot. Next time you're at a Biolab, I'll mark a terminal for you, and all you need to do is access it for an energy boost.
Single Use Desert Scrub v2 Camo

Daimyo's three-round magazine contains the headshot killing potential of a bolt-action sniper rifle, with the follow-up potential usually found in semi-automatic snipers. All factions can use NS weapons.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. NC use only.
Get started on the right foot with this bundle designed specifically for Infiltrators!
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.15 seconds.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Magrider. VS use only.

There are many <font color="#7ff4ff">directives</font> to complete for a variety of roles. You can prove your worth as a <font color="#7ff4ff">Heavy Assault</font> or demonstrate your proficiency as a <font color="#7ff4ff">Galaxy pilot</font>.
Apply the single use Indar Dunes camo pattern to your armor. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Applies a decal to your armor.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. TR use only.
Adds 2 grenades to the default magazine size.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. TR use only.
The Cortium Turbo Engine grants powerful thrust by converting stored minerals into fuel. The C300 consumes 200 Cortium per second.
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Our technicians inform me that the calibration is complete. Please proceed to the first scan location.
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> The origin of the transmission should be nearby, operative. Use the primary fire of your Signal Scanner to determine your distance from the target.
Visit the Resource Hub on Sanctuary
Applies a camo to your weapon. NC use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Umatherin</font> We will continue to require fresh harvests of these plants. I will contact you in the future when it is necessary.
Create a <font color="#00F0FF">'Personal Waypoint'</font> by right clicking where you want to place it on the map then selecting Personal Waypoint from the list.
This armor can only be worn by the VS Engineer.

Upon detonation, the Flash Grenade will temporarily blind, deafen, and reduce the accuracy of infantry within its blast radius, making it perfect for breaching crowded rooms.

3 second fuse.
This customization adds a Grey75 decal to the cockpit glass. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 16 missiles.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.45 seconds.
Your weekly contribution efforts have earned you a Tier 3 reward.
Adds Hubcaps to the Sunderer. TR use only.
Reduces the time to transition in and out of Sprint Mode.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 17 shells.
Skill set line for the assault rifle
Improve the Vanguard's rotation speed, reverse speed and braking power.
A 2x zoom scope useful when engaging targets at greater distances.
This armor can only be worn by NC Engineers.
Mounted on the top of the Galaxy, this secondary weapon protects from threats above and to the sides. Operated by the passenger in seat 2.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon or sidearm will restock 12% of your primary and secondary weapon magazines for free.
Your weekly contribution efforts have earned you a Tier 1 reward.
When toggled on, firing while cloaked will act as if you had pressed the ability key, and uncloak you.
Renders nearby structures nearly indestructible by quickly repairing large amounts of health. Requires a nearby Silo to power the module. NC use only.
Single Use Temperate Forest Weapon Camo
Large wall that once fully constructed can withstand a moderate amount of damage. TR only.
Earn this service ribbon by healing your allies with the Medical Applicator, Nanite Healing Grenade, or Nano-Regen Device ability.
Certifications related to basic first aid and supplies
Applies a decal to your vehicle. NC use only.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. TR use only.
Single Use Temperate Forest Vehicle Camo
Items purchased with CP can only be equipped by this character.
Single Use Sandy Scrub Vehicle Camo
The L105 Zephyr fires a salvo of 105mm high-explosive rounds which are effective against both armor and personnel. All factions can use this weapon.
the vehicle can only be deployed outside.
Applies a camo to your armor, weapon or vehicle. VS use only.
Increases zoom, but also increases aiming time.
This customization adds a Red decal to the cockpit glass. VS use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 9.375%

Your personal shield is removed and replaced with 500 additional health. Equipment that adds or modifies shield health does not stack with this implant.

Perfect implants cannot be broken down.
The Lacerta assault rifle syncs an accurate, three round burst to a moderate refire rate, and creates a melodic barrage of plasma, perfect for mid-range engagements. VS use only.
Release a caustic cloud of smoke that is capable of harming soldiers in a 10 meter radius
Some classes have special abilities which can be activated.
Could not kick player from the squad.

<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Ayla:</font> Greetings. This is Representative Ayla of Nanite Systems. Please come visit me at the Atrium in Sanctuary at your earliest convenience. We have much to discuss.
Allows for the creation of a single mosquito aircraft in the outfitwars game mode. Usable from the home base vehicle terminals by those who have outfit permission to use the item.
The anti-tank AF-22 Crow's powerful warhead and lock-on capabilities have proved the weapon as an effective solution to enemy armor.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Magrider by 450 seconds.
Vehicle cannot be deployed here because all respawn locations would be blocked.
Outfit decal of the french outfit 1FR on miller
Apply the Desert Scrub v2 camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Apply the single use Indar Highlands v1 camo pattern to your armor. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
This customization adds a Green decal to the cockpit glass. NC use only.
After a short charge-up, the DV-XE fires a 6-round particle projection barrage that can deal heavy damage to aircraft at long distances. NSO use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 28 rockets.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 18 shells.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 200 rounds.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 10%
The enemy is attacking the objective!
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your Light Assault. NC use only.
Adds chassis lights to the under carriage of the ANT. VS use only.
This black, left-handed NS-10 Burster fires flak rounds which detonate near enemy aircraft, shredding their armor. All factions can use NS weapons.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 128 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 240 rounds.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. NC use only.

The Nanite Systems Deep Vision is an Infrared Scope which provides 6x magnification and can highlight targets at moderate distances.

Hold Sprint to steady aim.
Become a Member to gain access to the benefits listed below!
Adds cosmetic plating to your Lightning. NC use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 100 ms.
Unlocks access to Spitfire Turrets. Infiltrator only.
Get the Advance Intel Bundle I to gain access to new weapons before they hit the Depot!
When your shield breaks, it releases a pulse of repairing nanites that heal allied mechanical objects within 10m for 263 health over 4 seconds. <font color="#dc9c36">Engineer only.</font>
Improved speed and acceleration. (More effective than previous rank)
Equipment Terminals let you change your class and resupply ammo.
Built to look like the standard U-100 to avoid suspicion from upper management, the inner-workings of this weapon were completely overhauled for pinpoint accuracy and enhanced power over distance.
You can limit who has access to your current vehicle by pressing the Page Down key.
Revenge is sweet, but why stop there? TR use only.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 5%
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 8.75%
Increases resupply amount and range of Ammo Kits by 10%
Increases the range of the Proximity Radar to 30 meters.
